message.content:
cs.CV, cs.RO, cs.GR, cs.MM, cs.LG. 

The paper proposes a method for capturing human motions using a single event camera, which involves computer vision and robotics (cs.CV and cs.RO). The method also uses CNN-based human pose detection, which falls under computer graphics (cs.GR) and multimedia (cs.MM). Additionally, the paper discusses the efficiency and accuracy of the proposed method, which relates to machine learning (cs.LG).
